Emeka Ilechukwu (amụrụ n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 1975) bụ onye na-ese ma na-emepụta nka na Naijiria nke na-eji ọtụtụ ihe emepụta nka akụkụ atọ (3D).Ọtụtụ oge na nka akpụrakpụ ma nke eserese.
Ilechukwu si Nnewi, obodo dị na Anambra steeti, Naịjirịa
Ọ gara Institute of Management and Technology (IMT) Enugu, Enugu State, Nigeria
Ilechukwu nwere Higher National Diploma (HND) na Fine Arts ma ọ bụ ọkachamara na ihe ọkpụkpụ.
N'afọ 2016, Ilechukwu sonyere na ihe ngosi Art, the Retro Africa Way nke akpọrọ Africa Modernism

Ilechukwu sonyere ndị ọzọ na-emepụta nka mgbe a mere mmemme a, n'etiti ha bụ Duke Asidere, Anthea Epelle, Tyna Adebowale, Joe Essien, Joseph Eze, Anthonia Nneji, Bob-Nosa Uwagboe, Khenye Gager, Chika Idu, Chukz Oknokwo, Karen Gager, Terna Iwar, Tolu Aliki, Frank Enebeli, Uchay Joel Chima, na ndị ọzọ.Ilechukwu ahazila ihe ngosi ise naanị ya mere, salons iri ise ma mekọta ihe ngosi ya na ndị omenka ndị ọzọ nọ na mpaghara à na mba ụwa.
Ihe osise Ilechukwu sitere na ahụmịhe na ihe omume na-eme gburugburu ya
Ụfọdụ n'ime ihe osise ya sitere n'ihe omume dị kà Mother's Day, ụwa ịntanetị nkè ugbu à na-agbanwe agbanwe, wdg
N'ihe osise a, enyí bụ ihe atụ nke ihe owuwu na usoro na-anabata eziokwu dị ugbu a nke ime azụmahịa.Njikọ nke ụwa mebere emepe na ụwa n'ezie.
Nke a na-egosi ụmụ nwanyị asatọ, ha na-anọchite anya omenala Africa ma ọ bụ nke obodo ndị ọzọ dị ka a na-ahụ na ejiji ma ọ bụ ụdị ejiji ha.
Lekki - Ikoyi link bridge, Lagos, Nigeria
